titleStmt.title: Totenham Court A pleasant comedie: acted in the yeare MDCXXXIII. At the private house in Salisbury-Court. The author Thomas Nabbes.
titleStmt.author: Nabbes, Thomas, 1605?-1645?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by Richard Ovlton, for Charles Greene; and are to be sold at the signe of the White Lyon, in Pauls Church-yard,

notesStmt.note: Also issued as part of his: Playes, maskes, epigrams, elegies, and epithalamiums.
Reproduction of the original in the University of Michigan. Library.

place.placeName: the signe of the White Lyon, in Pauls Church-yard
